mapper.insert:
insert into goods_return_change_detail (order_sn, goods_name, custom_code, extension_code, extension_id, goods_number, goods_price, transaction_price, settlement_price, discount, group_name, goods_size_name, goods_color_name, goods_thumb, promotion_desc, use_card, share_bonus, promotion_id, market_price, goods_sn, return_type, redemption, tag_type, exterior_type, gift_type, remark, return_sum, returnchange_sn, return_goods_img, depot_code) values
( #{insertList.orderSn}, #{insertList.goodsName}, #{insertList.customCode}, #{insertList.extensionCode}, #{insertList.extensionId}, #{insertList.goodsNumber}, #{insertList.goodsPrice}, #{insertList.transactionPrice}, #{insertList.settlementPrice}, #{insertList.discount}, #{insertList.groupName}, #{insertList.goodsSizeName}, #{insertList.goodsColorName}, #{insertList.goodsThumb}, #{insertList.promotionDesc}, #{insertList.useCard}, #{insertList.shareBonus}, #{insertList.promotionId}, #{insertList.marketPrice}, #{insertList.goodsSn}, #{insertList.returnType}, #{insertList.redemption}, #{insertList.tagType}, #{insertList.exteriorType}, #{insertList.giftType}, #{insertList.remark}, #{insertList.returnSum}, #{insertList.returnchangeSn}, #{insertList.returnGoodsImg}, #{insertList.depotCode} )
mapper.sql: grcd.goods_name goodsName, grcd.custom_code customCode, grcd.extension_code extensionCode, grcd.goods_number goodsNumber, grcd.goods_price goodsPrice, grcd.transaction_price transactionPrice, grcd.settlement_price settlementPrice, grcd.grcd.discount discount, grcd.goods_size_name goodsSizeName, grcd.goods_color_name goodsColorName, grcd.goods_thumb goodsThumb, grcd.share_bonus shareBonus, grcd.market_price marketPrice, grcd.goods_sn goodsSn, grcd.return_sum returnSum, grcd.returnchange_sn returnChangeSn, mog.min_buy_num minBuyNum, mog.customer_material_code customerMaterialCode, mog.buy_unit buyUnit
